attributes.action: Force Wirral borough Council to reconsider its plans to close libraries on the Wirral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In 2009, Wirral Borough Council plans to close 11 of the areas 24 libraries.

We the undersigned believe that this is an affront to the democratic right of the people of the area to accessible cultural and educational resources, it it not something that the people voted for and it s not something that the people want. We encourage the Prime Minister and the Culture secretary to step in and put an end to this ugly attack on the cultural and educational birth right of the people of Wirral
